content.text: Match ends, Juventus 2, Celtic 0.
Second Half ends, Juventus 2, Celtic 0.
Offside, Juventus. Emanuele Giaccherini tries a through ball, but Fabio Quagliarella is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Lassad (Celtic) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by James Forrest.
Emilio Izaguirre (Celtic) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Mauricio Isla (Juventus).
Attempt saved. Beram Kayal (Celtic) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Gary Hooper.
Attempt saved. James Forrest (Celtic) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Joe Ledley.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Paul Pogba (Juventus) because of an injury.
Dangerous play by Beram Kayal (Celtic).
Fabio Quagliarella (Juventus) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Georgios Samaras (Celtic) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Joe Ledley.
Offside, Juventus. Fabio Quagliarella tries a through ball, but Mauricio Isla is caught offside.
Lassad (Celtic) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Leonardo Bonucci (Juventus).
Attempt missed. Gary Hooper (Celtic) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Charlie Mulgrew.
Substitution, Celtic. Lassad replaces Kris Commons.

Foul by Fabio Quagliarella (Juventus).

Substitution, Juventus. Mauricio Isla replaces Arturo Vidal.
Goal!  Juventus 2, Celtic 0. Fabio Quagliarella (Juventus) left footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Arturo Vidal.
Emilio Izaguirre (Celtic) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Simone Padoin (Juventus) wins a free kick on the right wing.

Attempt saved. Fabio Quagliarella (Juventus) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Alessandro Matri.

Substitution, Celtic. Efe Ambrose replaces Victor Wanyama.
